text: Buenos dias Luz! I hope you and your beautiful family are doing well. I was wondering if you would be able to clean my house on Monday or Wednesday next week, instead of Tuesday? If that won't work could you come the next week on Monday, Tuesday or Wednesday, which is the 28th, 29th or 30th? Please let me know. Thank you! God bless you! ğŸ™Œ ğŸ™ğŸ¼â¤ï¸
